text: Serious Sweet is a 2016 novel by A. L. Kennedy. It is Kennedy's 8th novel and narrates the story of a civil servant who offers letter-writing services to single women.http://themanbookerprize.com/books/serious-sweet-by-l-kennedy In July 2016, it was longlisted for the 2016 Man Booker Prize. ==Awards and honors== *2016 Man Booker Prize, longlistee. ==References== Category:2016 British novels
title: Serious Sweet
